title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 135.1 - Filing statement and related documents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 135.1 - Filing statement and related documents

State Regulations
(a) General. The filing statement shall
contain or be accompanied by all of the items of information required by Real

Property Law, sections 337-a and 338(4). The filing statement shall also be
accompanied by the offering statement required by Real Property Law, section
337-b. (b) Maps. Submitted maps
must comply with Real Property Law, section 337-a(8). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
135.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
